projects.name: Task Tracker
projects.description: A great project to get started with React and Vue. After building out the front end I used Django rest framework to build out the API. I used Celery to build out a task that checks the database every minute for active reminders. It then grabs the time of those reminders and then compares it to the current time. Twilio API is then used to send the reminder.
projects.short: A task tracker/ reminder app that will send a notification for an active reminder at set time using Twilio API
videos: <video width="530" height="530" onclick="this.play()" autoplay muted><source src="../static/videos/twilio_ttrack_preview.mp4" type="video/mp4"></video>

projects.name: Guess Number Game
projects.description: Built with C# and mySql. User has to guess a number between 1 and 10. The fewer the guesses are, the more points the user racks up. After a game, the user can then add themselves to the leaderboard by just inputting their name. They can view the leaderboard to see where they rank.
projects.short: Fun simple game where user has to guess a number between 1 and 10, and try to beat their previous scores. Made with C#, MySQL
videos: <video width="530" height="530" onclick="this.play()" autoplay muted><source src="../static/videos/guessNumber.mp4" type="video/mp4"></video>

projects.name: Login & Register Form
projects.description: One of my very first projects this form was built with C#. Allows new users to register. Database used was MySQL. Once user is logged in, a message can be typed and saved in the database.
projects.short: A simple login form with register, login, and add message features

projects.name: Grocery Store
projects.description: This grocery store was built with Django Python and utilizes your basic CRUD operations to add, update, retrieve, and delete products. With Django, admin can discount products in backend.
projects.short: This grocery store was built with Django Python and utilizes your basic CRUD operations to add, update, retrieve, and delete products. With Django, admin can discount products in backend.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: Fun snake game built with C#. The goal is to try to increase the size of the snake (and racking up as many points as possible) by catching the red dot.
projects.short: Fun snake game built with C#.
videos: <video width="530" height="350" onclick="this.play()" autoplay muted><source src="../static/videos/snake_game.mp4" type="video/mp4"></video>
